title.rendered: Spicy corn, banger and Mexican-style rice

content.rendered:
Spicy corn, banger and Mexican-style rice

Ingredients

Ingredients
1 packet Fry’s Wood Smoked Breakfast Bangers (6 x 50g), cut into cubes
30ml (2 Tbsp) oil
1 onion, finely chopped
5ml (1 tsp) crushed garlic
1 yellow bell pepper, diced
2 whole sweetcorn – cut the kernels off the corn
Salt and pepper, to taste
10ml (2 tsp) medium curry powder
30ml (2 Tbsp) chopped parsley
750ml (3 cups) cooked, drained rice
45ml (3 Tbsp) chopped peppadews

Directions

Heat the oil in a large pan, add the onion, garlic and peppers and fry until soft.

Add the sweetcorn and chopped Bangers and fry for 2 minutes.

Stir in the curry powder and cook for ½ a minute.

Add the remaining ingredients and heat through and serve.
